replies.body: Same problem with thresh, blitz, and just about every type of latching type skillshot. Deal with it.

> [{quoted}](name=DatEpicPotato,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=logAQOsu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-24T12:44:40.537+0000)
>
> Same problem with thresh, blitz, and just about every type of latching type skillshot. Deal with it.

Yeah Riot seems to be bad at designing these sorts of abilities with all of them having there "Wtf seriously" moments.

Got to agree with you there... 

Especially seems to be those Thresh hooks that DIDN'T touch me and still hooked me, but when I'm playing, it gives them a full cavity search with the hook, yet still misses. xD

What is wrong with it?

Seems fine to me.
its huge. it can go past you and still "hit" you. i think the ult version hitbox is actually slightly smaller. cos ive had times were a standing still target got hit my E but not R....

LeBlanc's hitbox is actually a lot larger than indication, it was like Syndra's E, even if the ball didn't touch you it would still stun making her one of the top mid laners. Same thing to Ashe's old arrow, Nidalee's Spear and Mundo's cleavers. I find the same thing is happening to Kennen, Lee and Morgana's Q. I know Morgana's is meant to have a huge hitbox, but it's fair that standing barely away from Nidalee's spear and not getting hit is okay, but when you're literally standing to the side of it and you get hit.
